WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
S/V SAUDADE REPORTS CREWMAN REQUIRING MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE IN 10-28.46N 047-08.85W AT 181200Z JAN.
VESSELS IN VICINITY ABLE TO PROVIDE MEDICAL
ASSISTANCE REQUESTED TO ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 5965 9670 9292,
FAX: 5965 9663 2450, E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
